# Draft:Muskingum River State Park

|coords_ref=
|created=
|length_mi=112
|operator=Ohio Department of Natural Resources
|website=
}}
The Muskingum River State Park or the Muskingum River Parkway is a  state park in Ohio's Coshocton, Morgan, Muskingum, and Washington counties.
See also
* Muskingum River Navigation Historic District

Further reading
